channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1660; 10:15PM; 1274 W Court St; MAP: https://bit.ly/44MppmD; Echo Park; KNOCKDOWN: The first 26 firefighters initiated a transitional attack (coordinated application of water from the exterior of the structure that provides a 'break of the fire triangle' by cooling the environment prior to transitioning to an offensive attack) and once they knocked back the fire at the front of the structure they made entry for an offensive attack. It is a small structure (not currently occupied) and no other buildings were damaged. The additionally requested fire companies were canceled enroute. The knockdown was achieved in 15 minutes. A thorough search of the home found no one inside the building. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details. ; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 CM20 CM22 E11 E20 E211 E220 E235 RA11 RA3 T11 T20 T35; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1660; 10:00PM; 1274 W Court St; MAP: https://bit.ly/44MppmD; Echo Park; One story, single family dwelling with heavy fire showing. Two additional task forces requested. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 3; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 E11 E20 E220 RA3 T20; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1375; 06:23PM; 9507 S Western Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/417MtZT; #GramercyPark; The first 32 LAFD firefighters, with assistance from LA Co FD on scene, extinguished the flames in one bungalow in 14 minutes, protecting the remainder of the nearby bungalows in the row. No one trapped. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E264 E295 E57 E64 E66 RA257 RA57 RA857 T64 T95; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1375; 06:09PM; 9507 S Western Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/417MtZT; #GramercyPark; One-story bungalow with heavy smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E264 E295 E57 E64 E66 RA257 RA57 RA857 T64 T95; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0814; 12:47PM; 9010 N Cedros Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/417aOyM; Panorama City; Firefighters found fire in one unoccupied unit of a two-story garden-style apartment building. Smoke was making its way into adjacent units and forcing residents to shelter on their exterior balconies. Firefighters simultaneously made entry to the fire unit with hose lines, as others ascended ladders to the roof to provide vertical ventilation. It took 43 firefighters 23 minutes to extinguish the flames. Two patients were assessed for minor smoke inhalation by Firefighter-Paramedics. Crews used blowers to mechanically ventilate all affected units and clear the smoke from the building. Cause under investigation.; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC12 E239 E275 E298 E7 E81 E98 EM15 RA18 RA39 RA90 RA91 RA98 T39 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0814; 12:24PM; 9010 N Cedros Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/417aOyM; #PanoramaCity; Two-story apartment building with fire in one second-floor unit. Smoke is making its way into other units. Several patients in adjacent units are sheltering on their balconies to escape smoke conditions. Offensive mode.; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC12 E239 E275 E298 E7 E81 E98 EM15 RA18 RA39 RA90 RA91 RA98 T39 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Update Hazardous Materials; INC#0284; 07:50AM; 2101 E Pacific Coast Hwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3AWlQfE; #Wilmington; The hazardous materials risk has been mitigated. A total of four patients have been transported from the scene, one of which was rescued by a rigid basket/stretcher and lowered by a rope system to ground level (patients: 35M moderate, 43M moderate, 26M moderate & 40M serious). No further hazard.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; AP65 BC13 BC4 BC6 CM20 CM22 E21 E221 E248 E285 E3 E38 E48 E49 E85 EM1 EM13 EM4 HR3 JT1 JT4 JT6 PI1 RA101 RA112 RA21 RA266 RA36 RA38 RA57 RA64 RA66 RA848 SQ21 SQ48 T21 T38 T48 T85 UR85; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Hazardous Materials; INC#0284; 06:39AM; 2101 E Pacific Coast Hwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3AWlQfE; #Wilmington; Gases leaking in the area, reported to be butane and hydrogen sulfide, and several patients are in need of medical assistance. LAFD has responded with Hazardous Materials and USAR specialists. The leak has now been shut down. Patient care is in progress by Firefighter Paramedics. Ages/genders/conditions unknown at this time.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC4 BC6 CM20 CM22 E21 E221 E248 E285 E3 E38 E48 E49 EM1 EM13 EM4 HR3 JT1 JT4 JT6 RA101 RA112 RA21 RA266 RA36 RA38 RA57 RA64 RA66 RA848 SQ21 SQ48 T21 T38 T48 T85 UR85; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0142; 03:49AM; 3767 S Normandie Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lrK74E; #ExpositionPark; A one-story vacant restaurant, fully involved with fire (and site of previous burns), took 22 minutes to extinguish in defensive mode by the first 30 firefighters to arrive. No reported injuries. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 CM20 CM22 E15 E215 E226 E26 E266 E34 E46 EM11 RA15 T15 T26 T66; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0142; 03:27AM; 3767 S Normandie Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lrK74E; #ExpositionPark; One-story vacant restaurant with heavy fire showing throughout the building. Defensive mode.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 CM20 CM22 E15 E215 E226 E26 E266 E34 E46 EM11 RA15 T15 T26 T66; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange
